data.category: Facts by The Growing Developer ft Developer Singh

facts.title: Computers run on binary code that means their software is written using only 1s and 0s
The First Gigabyte Drive Cost $40,000
facts.description: It was released in 1980 and weighed 550lbs. How’s that for a portable drive?

facts.title: About 90% of the World’s Currency only exists on Computers
facts.description: This means only about 10% of the global currency is actually cash

facts.title: The password for the Computer Controls of nuclear tipped missiles of the U.S was 00000000 for eight years.
facts.description: Even our Developer Singh was amazed
